title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Professional Adult Learning Utilizing Mobile-Based E-Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners engage in self-directed learning activities at least three times per week via a mobile platform.
Learners apply specialized knowledge in social fields to propose solutions for real-world job problems with over 80% accuracy.
Learners participate in formative assessments at least once a week and incorporate feedback through a mobile assessment system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
